DOC.brief_summary: The homeopathic remedy 'naja-comp' will improve functional outcome measured by the Barthel-Index. The homeopathic remedy 'naja-comp' will decrease complications during geriatric rehabilitation measured by rate of unplanned discharge to hospital.
DOC.brief_title: Trial to Investigate the Influence of the Homeopathic Remedy Naja-comp on Stroke Therapy in Geriatric Rehabilitation
DOC.detailed_description: Secondary outcome for functional improvement are Scandinavian Stroke Scale, 4D+S-Scale and Timed-Up&Go-Test.
DOC.criteria: stroke within 60 days after onset stroke by injury or tumor stroke older than 60 days missing consent for participation participation at other clinical trials
